name: Sudoku: Newspaper
description:
Be smarter everyday
Sudoku : newspaper has been improved so that you can enjoy the game comfortably. Unlimited puzzles are available to further activating the brain. Fill your time with a funny number puzzle game! Choose a difficulty and update your record.

How to Play
Fills the empty cells with numbers from 1 to 9. Make sure that the numbers do not overlap in the 3x3 column of each horizontal line. The puzzle is completed when 1 to 9 are filled in 81 spaces.

FEATURES
Sudoku : newspaper is fun for both beginners and professional players.
Try changing the settings on the Board Options page.
• Four difficulty levels: Easy / Normal / Hard / Expert
• Memo function
• Convenient number pad
• Reward given to play the game every day
• Unlimited number of puzzle games
